SMARTFEEDSUPDATE_SMART_DESC: The update will process feeds depending on their publication's frequency. To use this type of synchronization, we recommend to launch the cron frequently (every 4 minutes).
SMARTFEEDSUPDATE_FREQUENCY_NOTIFICATION: Blocks' title indicate the update frequency of the feeds located below.
SMARTFEEDSUPDATE_ERROR_FEEDS_NUMBER_SAVE: [Error] The number of feeds to save doesn't correspond to the real total feeds count in the database.
